pages.text: $(l)Goblin Traders: Deals Galore$() $(br2)Goblin Traders adds two new types of traders to Minecraft, offering unique and valuable deals. These mischievous goblins can be found deep in the caves or wandering the Nether.

$(l)Types of Goblin Traders$() $(br2)- $(l)Cave Goblin Trader$(): Found in Overworld caves. Offers rare enchantments and valuable resources. $(br2)- $(l)Nether Goblin Trader$(): Found in the Nether. Trades powerful gear and unique Nether-related items.
$(l)Trading with Goblins$() $(br2)Approach a goblin trader and right-click to open their trading interface. Their deals may vary, but you're sure to find something valuable in their little satchel.
